label: includedConsignmentItem
comment: A consignment item included in this supply chain consignment.
A referenced consignment item included in this referenced supply chain consignment.

rangeIncludes.comment: An item within a consignment of goods separately identified for transport and customs purposes.

domainIncludes.comment: A separately identifiable collection of goods items to be transported or available to be transported from one consignor to one consignee via one or more modes of transport where each consignment is the subject of one single transport contract.
